name: Empty Desert (Hilldale Tract)
description: A vast, empty expanse of sun-baked desert, where the only 'planning' is the harsh hand of nature. The ground is cracked and dry, stretching endlessly under an indifferent sky. A few scattered, hardy cacti stand as silent sentinels to the relentless heat and desolation. To the west, a faint, barely discernible trail leads further into the empty scrubland. The air is still, heavy with the scent of dry earth and the unspoken promise of nothing but more emptiness.
